snippet: Detectives charged with identifying the killer responsible for a clutch of bodies found in a derelict gas station in the Nevada desert seek clues on damaged video.
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Evidence, directed by Olatunde Osunsanmi and starring Stephen Moyer and Radha Mitchell.
lead_paragraph: Detectives charged with identifying the killer responsible for a clutch of bodies found in a derelict gas station in the Nevada desert seek clues on damaged video.

headline.seo: Stephen Moyer and Radha Mitchell Star in ‘Evidence’
headline.main: They Lost Even Before Getting to Las Vegas
